QuestData.Title: Burning Crusade: Through the Dark Portal
QuestData.Description: For years the Dark Portal loomed silent... forgotten. But it is silent no longer.$B$BAfter stopping the demonic assault here, our forces breached the portal and met the demons on their own ground!$B$BNow, we are locked in a savage war, and there are some who think we might not win. So it is our duty, our grim pleasure, to battle the fiends of Outland and ensure our victory, $n.$B$BIf you would help us, then report to Lieutenant General Orion at once. He awaits you in the Outland...
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the Dark Portal and find Lieutenant General Orion. He awaits your arrival on the other side, in Outland.
QuestData.RewardText: Our Expedition made it safely through the Portal and set up a new base called Thrallmar. Yet as you can see. the Burning Legion moved in and cut us off from our brothers. Clearly, the demons hope to retake the Dark Portal and prevent us from gathering reinforcements from Azeroth.
